analysis.key_quote: There is no clear definition of policy influencing position which would make it possible to move almost every civil service position into excepted service and remove all protections for employees.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the lack of a clear definition for policy-influencing positions, suggesting that it could lead to the removal of protections for a broad range of civil service employees. This indicates opposition to the proposed rule, particularly regarding merit-based systems and employee rights.
